name: Ridge Racer 3D
description:
Drift into victory with high octane 3D racing battles!

The Ridge Racer® series returns to set the racing world on fire with
brand new features, breathtaking stereoscopic 3D visuals, a wider
variety of machines, new environments, expanded customization and
updated drift mechanics. Ridge Racer® 3D will be the hottest racing game
on the Nintendo 3DS.

Drift through hairpin turns at blistering speeds to edge out the rest of
the pack with powerful drift-tuned cars. Using the stereoscopic 3D power
of the Nintendo 3DS, players will be able to experience a level of
intimacy with the on-screen races like never before. Players can now
accurately judge the distance between them and the competition with 3D
depth of field for some of the most intense arcade racing available.

Use Parental Controls to restrict 3D mode for children 6 and under.
